description:
*This product contains the portion of the content from the full Custom PET Pack that is compatible with Mega Man Battle Network Legacy Collection Vol. 2.

A Special Skin
This skin lets you change the appearance of the 3D MegaMan on the Vol. 2 menu screen to Dark MegaMan.


Two Rearranged Music Tracks
Adds two new music tracks to Vol. 2’s music player.

Note: Special skins have no effect on MegaMan’s appearance during gameplay.
name: Custom PET Pack Vol.2
